name: Crown Fantasy
description:
This is a playable demo only at the moment.

Crown Fantasy is a turn-based jrpg inspired adventure game. About a prince embarking on a journey across Illore to get in his peoples good graces before he assumes the throne. At least, if all goes well. Since his older brother is still in the running for the crown.

Features Some features not available in demo
  • Vast amount of maps to explore, interact with, harvest,  and find chests
  • Get into turn-based combat with over 90+ different creatures
  • Up to 5 playable team members in battle
  • Dungeons to conquer
  • Magic Card crafting system
  • Multiple endings
Controls
  • Movement- Arrow Keys
  • Inspect- Enter / Z
  • Cancel- Space / X
  • Menu-  X
Full Release

Around Summer 2020

Contact
